attributes.action: Reconsider short hair cuts in schools this doesn't affect their learning
attributes.additional_details: As this doesn't affect their learning at all
attributes.background: Help us change the rules for our children regarding hair cuts in school

rejection.details:
Policies on uniforms and any other requirements relating to personal appearance are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following related petition, which you might like to sign:

Require schools to have a gender-neutral uniform policy: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578439
